snippet: Justin Thomas overcame a double bogey on the 14th hole and nervous moments on the final one to win the CIMB Classic in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, for his first PGA Tour title.
abstract: Justin Thomas wins CIMB Classic golf tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Justin Thomas overcame a double bogey on the 14th hole and nervous moments on the final one to win the CIMB Classic in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, for his first PGA Tour title.
